ygData.subject: Compiling issue with demo.cpp
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to compile the demo program demo.ccp in Visual Studio.NET. My Cantera installation (latest) did not produce any lib directory with the library

Hi, I am trying to compile the demo program demo.ccp in Visual
Studio.NET. =
My Cantera installation (latest) did not produce any lib
directory with the=
 library files that i need to include in the linker
directive while buildin=
g the demo.cpp file. (ex: cantera.lib, oneD.lib
etc.) I have two DLL files =
in the Cantera directory: msvcp71.dll and
msvcr71.dll. Is there a way to bu=
ild the demo without the lib files. I
thought lib files were required at li=
nk time to link to the dll files.
Has anybody faced this issue and got it s=
olved?
Thanks in advance, Shyam.
